about.bio: I am a Software Developer with more interest in the latest technologies and trends.

I completed my bachelor's in Computer Engineering from Gujarat Technological University in India. I acquired work experience in various fields during my undergrad as an Intern. Lately, I am concentrating on improving my problem-solving skills and knowledge of DS and Algorithms.

I am eager to constantly learn new things. At the moment, my focus is on delving deeper into algorithms. I am also learning back-end development and of course, I am always up for trying out newer things whether it is Technical or some crazy life things.
For a comprehensive list of my work & experiences, please refer to my work page.
In case you are interested in cooperating with me, do not hesitate to contact me.
